findings.title: Untitled Finding
findings.description: Events duplicated in /src/data/events/ and /public/events/ | Analysis system in /src/analysis/ appears unused | Multiple *Test.ts files in utils instead of formal test suite | Files that may not be referenced | Multiple configuration files for same tools
